mapper.insert: replace into company (companyId, companyName, companyDescription, orderConfirmed, orderRejected, orderCompleted, orderFailed, valid) value (#{companyId}, #{companyName}, #{companyDescription}, #{orderConfirmed}, #{orderRejected}, #{orderCompleted}, #{orderFailed}, 1)

replace into users ( userId, userRole, userName, companyId, departmentId) values
( #{item.userId}, #{item.userRole}, #{item.userName}, #{item.companyId}, #{item.departmentId} )

replace into department (companyId, departmentId, departmentName) values
( #{item.companyId}, #{item.departmentId}, #{item.departmentName} )
mapper.update: update company set orderConfirmed = orderConfirmed + 1 where companyId = #{orderId}
update company set orderRejected = orderRejected + 1 where companyId = #{orderId}
update company set orderCompleted = orderCompleted + 1 where companyId = #{orderId}
update company set orderFailed = orderFailed + 1 where companyId = #{orderId}
